cause.description:
This cause is designed to raise funds for Edward N. Cole Canoe Base, a Boy Scout camp in Northern Michigan. All funds donated will go directly to the Detroit Area Council, to help support the camping programs.
1. Provide America's youth with a quality, fun-filled program.
2. Every scout deserves the right to enjoy camp.
3. There is an almost 40 year tradition of quality to uphold for the Camp.
cause.mission: To continue the legacy of quality staffing & programs.
cause.name: Edward N. Cole Canoe Base
